name: UrbanPiper
description: Restaurant technology platform for online ordering and delivery management

opengraph.title: UrbanPiper: POS Integrations To Manage Online Orders
opengraph.description: UrbanPiper's POS integrations allow you to manage orders from Swiggy, Zomato, UberEats, Talabat and others straight from your existing POS
